qoutes.text: You know right how much important you are to me. I make mistakes I am not the perfect guy anyone would seek.
I always make you upset. But in spite of all you are all I want to be with and you are all I think about.
After you entered my life everything has changed. From what I thought about myself to how little things about you make my day.
From just doing our jamming sessions on Spotify to phone calls and study sessions and everything makes my day and me happier.
You are not with me I can't ask you just to meet me for an ice cream treat or evening walk sessions or hug you when you are upset.
But consider this gesture as a virtual hug from me. And a token for apology. Please baat karlo mujhse tuhare bina accha nhi lagta

propose.text: In between all uncertainty I know something which is certain and that is my love for you.I love you and I miss you. A lot. Maaf kardo baby.
propose.subtext: That's all I will wait for your call
